constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 6 (Monday, January 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GOMEZ:
H.R. 244.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18
[Page H123]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Executive Branch Conflict of Interest Act
